title: Crypt0Gore
author: Crypt0Gore
content: I started earning money online before crypto through affiliate marketing and other, I still have my tools and I feel like taking the next step to crypto and online casino, I am looking for list of online casinos that pays people for referring other people even if they have to make deposits first, what is important to me is finding the highest paying ones as I have ways of promoting that I believe will not fail me or waste my time, also is there anyone into this type of side income thing? What type of   advice can you give a dude like me?

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: I will advice you to make more research about it yourself, check the gambling board to know the gambling sites on this forum, you will need to read their affiliation terms and conditions and also know the amount of money you can be making from each people you refer to their gambling site if they start to gamble. Example is https://livecasino.iohttps://livecasino.io/help-center/help-terms-and-conditions/livecasino-affiliate-program-terms-and-conditionshttps://livecasino.io/affiliate-program/commissions

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Do you have any platform to promote your affiliate link? If you have, you can create affiliate account in the reputed casinos like stake.com or other platform. However, if I'm correct, bc.game has a better affiliate commission than most other reputed casinos and for your info, bc.game is themselves a trusted one.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: Crypt0Gore on February 01, 2023, 08:17:18 AMI started earning money online before crypto through affiliate marketing and other, I still have my tools and I feel like taking the next step to crypto and online casino, I am looking for list of online casinos that pays people for referring other people even if they have to make deposits first, what is important to me is finding the highest paying ones as I have ways of promoting that I believe will not fail me or waste my time, also is there anyone into this type of side income thing? What type of   advice can you give a dude like me? Almost all if not all casinos offer some affiliate commission as long as your affiliates keep playing there,they cannot give you commissions just because you referred someone who just registers there and never gamble a cent,once your affiliates start playing most of the reputable casinos pay to people like you hefty commissions like 25-50% depending on what kind of games your affiliates play.Since you have the tools as you say just go ahead and find the people to join these referral links for the casinos and as I said they pay hefty commissions so if you are a truly good marketer you can make a lot of money by this venture.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: Crypt0Gore on February 01, 2023, 08:17:18 AMI started earning money online before crypto through affiliate marketing and other, I still have my tools and I feel like taking the next step to crypto and online casino, I am looking for list of online casinos that pays people for referring other people even if they have to make deposits first, what is important to me is finding the highest paying ones as I have ways of promoting that I believe will not fail me or waste my time, also is there anyone into this type of side income thing? What type of   advice can you give a dude like me? Promoting casinos and referring gamblers is one of the best ways to make money especially if you referred whales or players who upgrade to VIP but the competition is very stiff, high rollers usually sign up to affiliates who offer them a percentage of their income but if you're good at it the best way is to first compile the most trusted casinos in the industry, don't think of just making money refer people to reputable casinos, so you'll not be blamed by gamblers for referring them to scam casinos.I've seen review sites still promoting known scam casinos because of the high payout they are getting as a promoter.

comments.author: iv4n
comments.body: https://www.casinoaffprograms.com/program-category/best-affiliate-programs/ - Best Affiliate Programs.On the left, you have some options for your search: Payment methods, Auto withdrawals, Admin fees, Available deal types, and many others. I hope this is what you are searching for.Just a quick reminder:QuoteThe key difference is that affiliate marketing focuses on third-party brand advocates to send customers to your business for a flat fee. Where referral marketing is focused on rewarding current customers to invite their friends to try your product/service.Quote from: Crypt0Gore on February 01, 2023, 08:17:18 AM... as I have ways of promoting that I believe will not fail me or waste my time, also is there anyone into this type of side income thing? What type of   advice can you give a dude like me? If you have ways to reach people who like to gamble then promoting some casinos (or all of them) and earning from affiliate/referral commissions (there's a difference in numbers as well) sounds like a great plan! Check some affiliate programs on the forum, and simply by typing "affiliate" in search you will see many threads about it... I guess it would be good for you to check some of them, I am sure you will find something useful.

comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: I don't know if it helps but you can take a look at this thread, although its a bit outdated.- [BIG LIST] Best Bitcoin & Altcoin Affiliate ProgramsTo give you an idea, here is a list[1] of all crypto casino that are being advertised here in this forum, you can take a look at each of them and see what referral percentage they offer from their services since most of them offers such perks.[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5333602.0

comments.author: coinerer
comments.body: According to my knowledge almost all gambling sites have refer system and there is almost same rule that if someone opens secondary account of your refer link and deposit there then you will get some percentage commission from there and many sites also give facility that if your referral link  As long as someone opens an account and gambles there, you will get a percentage of their winning rewards.  Quote from: Maus0728 on February 01, 2023, 09:27:48 AMhere is a list[1] of all crypto casino that are being advertised here in this forum, you can take a look at each of them and see what referral percentage they offer from their services since most of them offers such perks.[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5333602.0Here @Maus0728 has already given a link from where you can know about some of the good casinos promoted on this site so you should open an account with those sites and check the referral program to see how much commission they offer and what kind of commission facility they have. Hope this one brings you a positive result

comments.author: klidex
comments.body: Quote from: Crypt0Gore on February 01, 2023, 08:17:18 AMI started earning money online before crypto through affiliate marketing and other, I still have my tools and I feel like taking the next step to crypto and online casino, I am looking for list of online casinos that pays people for referring other people even if they have to make deposits first, what is important to me is finding the highest paying ones as I have ways of promoting that I believe will not fail me or waste my time, also is there anyone into this type of side income thing? What type of   advice can you give a dude like me? You offered yourself as a promoter to an online casino for a promotion and you don't think the casino will disappoint.And you yourself will choose the casino that can pay you the highest fees.However, does the casino paying you high fees really make the casino able to get a lot of new customers and do you guarantee that the success of your promotion will be very effective? pay you.After all, there are many very effective promotions that have been carried out by casinos without using referral services, so there may be little chance that a casino will pay you.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: Quote from: Crypt0Gore on February 01, 2023, 08:17:18 AMI started earning money online before crypto through affiliate marketing and other, I still have my tools and I feel like taking the next step to crypto and online casino, I am looking for list of online casinos that pays people for referring other people even if they have to make deposits first, what is important to me is finding the highest paying ones as I have ways of promoting that I believe will not fail me or waste my time, also is there anyone into this type of side income thing? What type of   advice can you give a dude like me? First of all, show what you are trying to offer;proofs of how good you are as an affiliate. Nothing will happen if you'll just say you are good and demanding something already. There are referrral bonuses in new gambling sites but I think you are looking for something such as a package deal from the gambling platform. If that so, you should create a profile for them to contact you wherein your works are there and more of a resume for them to look or use as a reference. If you are looking for high paying projects for such service, atleast make them to look after you.Quote from: klidex on February 01, 2023, 10:11:42 AMQuote from: Crypt0Gore on February 01, 2023, 08:17:18 AMI started earning money online before crypto through affiliate marketing and other, I still have my tools and I feel like taking the next step to crypto and online casino, I am looking for list of online casinos that pays people for referring other people even if they have to make deposits first, what is important to me is finding the highest paying ones as I have ways of promoting that I believe will not fail me or waste my time, also is there anyone into this type of side income thing? What type of   advice can you give a dude like me? You offered yourself as a promoter to an online casino for a promotion and you don't think the casino will disappoint.And you yourself will choose the casino that can pay you the highest fees.However, does the casino paying you high fees really make the casino able to get a lot of new customers and do you guarantee that the success of your promotion will be very effective? pay you.After all, there are many very effective promotions that have been carried out by casinos without using referral services, so there may be little chance that a casino will pay you. Project managers are an example of marketing affiliates. Also, it has many forms and the only point is for more people to know that certain project or to boost its popularity to target audiences.So yeah, there would be projects to pay but that would depend to OP whether projects will make a deal with him.

comments.author: delfastTions
comments.body: Quote from: klidex on February 01, 2023, 10:11:42 AMQuote from: Crypt0Gore on February 01, 2023, 08:17:18 AMI started earning money online before crypto through affiliate marketing and other, I still have my tools and I feel like taking the next step to crypto and online casino, I am looking for list of online casinos that pays people for referring other people even if they have to make deposits first, what is important to me is finding the highest paying ones as I have ways of promoting that I believe will not fail me or waste my time, also is there anyone into this type of side income thing? What type of   advice can you give a dude like me? You offered yourself as a promoter to an online casino for a promotion and you don't think the casino will disappoint.And you yourself will choose the casino that can pay you the highest fees.However, does the casino paying you high fees really make the casino able to get a lot of new customers and do you guarantee that the success of your promotion will be very effective? pay you.After all, there are many very effective promotions that have been carried out by casinos without using referral services, so there may be little chance that a casino will pay you.It seems to me that it’s so easy to take and offer some large, old crypto-casinos their promotion services so simply it won’t work.  Managers and marketers from the devs team of each major casino, of course, need to first read your resume and evaluate all those methods of working to attract customers that you write about, that you have them and they are very effective.  And then the question of your "trade secret" immediately arises.  And your way of working.  And before some officials give guarantees of cooperation, it is probably premature to tell and share secrets.  On the other hand, the employees of the marketing services of the casino will also not be able to assess the possibilities of the advantages of working with you.  This is how a vicious circle turns out, which can only be broken with offers or preliminary agreements with penalties.  This is just how I envision this kind of work.

comments.author: m2017
comments.body: Quote from: Crypt0Gore on February 01, 2023, 08:17:18 AMI started earning money online before crypto through affiliate marketing and other, I still have my tools and I feel like taking the next step to crypto and online casino, I am looking for list of online casinos that pays people for referring other people even if they have to make deposits first, what is important to me is finding the highest paying ones as I have ways of promoting that I believe will not fail me or waste my time, also is there anyone into this type of side income thing? What type of   advice can you give a dude like me? Are you not interested in the ethical side of the issue and is it only important for you that affiliate marketing is highly paid? But what about scam casinos that cheat and steal from their customers? Are you ready to promote them? I doubt that casinos with a good reputation will allocate large funds for affiliate marketing. They are doing well as it is. But scam projects are ready to spend money on this in order to attract new victims.The advice I can give is: only cooperate with worthy platforms, even if their payouts are lower. You would also not want to be among the victims of scam casinos.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: I think majority of online casinos do offer affiliate marketers the chance to earn money through their referral system, though I particularly can not pinpoint which casino pays highest, but I know casinos like stake.com, blackjack.fun and a host of others do have a referral system through which users can refer their friends to the casino and earn handsome reward for their efforts.I think you should take out some time and do some research to know which of this casinos pay the highest for such service.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: Crypt0Gore on February 01, 2023, 08:17:18 AMwhat is important to me is finding the highest paying ones as I have ways of promoting that I believe will not fail me or waste my time, also is there anyone into this type of side income thing? What type of   advice can you give a dude like me? As far as I know, in this forum there are lots of gambling sites that want to make high payments for their users who win legally, as long as they are not manipulated or multi-accounts in the game and win.If you want to become a partner of a well-known gambling site, you need to get to know the parties/owners of the online casino closely, to make you their reference/partner, of course you have certain requirements before you are made their agent.For this reason, if you want to promote a particular online casino, you need to complete a number of requirements provided by online casinos, to gain the trust of them and also the trust of other users, so that users don't get the wrong about you being an official agent or agenti llegal.However, if you want to start references to online casinos that are here, @Maus0728 has shown a list of the best casinos here, from now on you can communicate with them, I hope you can be chosen to be a partner of one of the online casinos here, good luck.

comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on February 01, 2023, 02:45:00 PMI think majority of online casinos do offer affiliate marketers the chance to earn money through their referral system, though I particularly can not pinpoint which casino pays highest, but I know casinos like stake.com, blackjack.fun and a host of others do have a referral system through which users can refer their friends to the casino and earn handsome reward for their efforts.I think you should take out some time and do some research to know which of this casinos pay the highest for such service.There are users who seem to be dedicated to referring gamblers and they made a review site for casinos. This is quite a good way to make it if they can make the review site like the authority in making it the source of ratings to be looked at for crypto gamblers.I find it not easy by the way even if you put the ref/aff link on your signature, people may visit the link but it's really unsure if you can make money out of it. How much does the casino give us if we bring a user that will spend $1000?

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Since you're already on this board, there were bunch of websites that are focused in affiliate marketing that has their links on their reviews website.You can get the idea from them and try to think of something unique that might attract visits to your referral links.And for the choices of casinos that you want to get a referral link, you can easily browse with all of them on this board(Gambling).

comments.author: jrrsparkles
comments.body: Quote from: Crypt0Gore on February 01, 2023, 08:17:18 AMI started earning money online before crypto through affiliate marketing and other, I still have my tools and I feel like taking the next step to crypto and online casino, I am looking for list of online casinos that pays people for referring other people even if they have to make deposits first, what is important to me is finding the highest paying ones as I have ways of promoting that I believe will not fail me or waste my time, also is there anyone into this type of side income thing? What type of   advice can you give a dude like me? Almost every cryptocurrency casino has referral programs so you can keep earning a certain percentage of their wagering amount forever and I don't think there is not mich difference in the rate for one to another and you can continue to use all of their referral links not just one to increase your referrals in my opinion.But keep in mind posting referal in your post is forbidden in bitcointalk so you can use the signature space for promotion referrals and other platforms as you know.

comments.author: Team_MegaPari
comments.body: Hey. Have a look at the MegaPari affiliate program - https://megaparipartners.com/Up to 90$ for tier-3 Automatic weekly payment A personal manager Promo materials for free on request c:

comments.author: Eureka_07
comments.body: Quote from: Crypt0Gore on February 01, 2023, 08:17:18 AM<snip>Advice is to not attract customers to casinos that seem to be doing shady businesses. Try picking the best casino you think of based on what you learned by browsing or through this forum. Then try the casino yourself first before telling the casino that you want to apply for their affiliate program. I would recommend reviewing these casinos: Roobet, Duelbits, Rollbit, Sportsbet.io, and Bitcasino. There are also more competitors that I did not mention. Do some background checking on them though before you start engaging.

comments.author: Cling18
comments.body: Quote from: blockman on February 01, 2023, 03:05:43 PMSince you're already on this board, there were bunch of websites that are focused in affiliate marketing that has their links on their reviews website.You can get the idea from them and try to think of something unique that might attract visits to your referral links.And for the choices of casinos that you want to get a referral link, you can easily browse with all of them on this board(Gambling).There are just things that you have to prepare and consider if you want to focus and earn better in affiliate marketing. You have to be sure that you're on the right platform with a huge target number and that you have a good number of followers. Since you have experienced earning on it before, you can look for legit casinos to promote but be sure to enlarge your target for a better earning.
